jate jate bhi ye nazrana diye jata hai
fir kalyug me abhiman
nahin nahin koyi tum saa haseen, ho
dil lgaya to dil ki khushi mit gayi
santo pe daag lagaye
man meraa dharati par, aur kabhi ambar me
ye jaat dharam ke jhagade
mujhse tum takrana na, aake yaha pachhatana na
badaa ahasaan farmaayaa
teri hi amanat har dhadkhan hai
e baba kukuruku
magar yeh musafir duwa mangta hai
us dil ko kabhi ka tod diya haye tod diya
nain so nain nahi milao nain nain so nain
mar ke jeene kee adaa jo duniyaan ko sikhalaayegaa
saz pe dhadkan ke gati hai gati hai
koyi mane ya na mane mere dil ki mehbuba ne
dete hain maal khota unchi dukaan vaale
tu na mili to han
wahi tham ke rah gayi hai
lui shamasha ui lui shamasha ui
anchal ko hawa me uda ke chal
mushkil hai jina, dede o hasina
jo tum muskuraa do
aapke sar pe bhi, ulfat ka taaj hai
haay kyaa din the wo bhii kyaa din the
ham khoe jate hai
bambai se aaya mera dost, dost ko salam karo
wo ladki shandar hai
nayi teri zindgani
hawaao ke paro par meraa ashiana
adami musafir hai, aata hai jaata hai
jab-jab unko dekhu aane lage angdayi
dil se mile dil, dil se mile dil
manwa jaye jhum
aji ruth kar ab
main ashko se khelu, main ashko se khelu
badnam na ho pyar mera
kaun jaane baansuriyaa kisako bulaae
mera bapu sath mere jaranail singh ban baitha
o father apna aisa huva hai ghotaala
vasant rut hai aaaa
jay jay santoshi mata jay jay ma
dil jal jayega aa aa aa
ho tera kya kahna
ruk na pau mai khichatee aau mai, dil ko jab dildar pukare
chhod o, chhod o, dekho dekho gore gore kale kale badal
jaago jaago mohan payare
hamko chehre se hatna gavara nahee
jee me aata hai, tere daman me
gulbadan khaadim ke haatha se
mar to nahi jaaege ham
naajo se tujhe pala maine, kaliyo kee tarah phulon kee tarah
sada sath nibhau, kahi aur na jau
dil ke lutne ki kisse shikayat karu
is duniya ko geet sikha de
kaha chal diye
ham kya kare, aur koi kya kare
dil ne kisi ko kabhi, apana to mana na tha
mujhe dosh na dena jag walo
lailaa ki hir ki kitaab me dekhaa hai
kabhi to milegi, kahi to milegi
